author: C R
title: I would avoid..
text: This hotel was chosen by other colleagues. I agree with other reviewers . I was put for 3 nights in a room the size of a mattress, so I had to ask for a bigger room. Dirty carpets, ripped couches, no extra toilet paper. There is no iron in the room, so watch out business travellers! They have one old iron downstairs, but no iron board so I basicallly could not use it. Went to a conference hall with a wrinkled dress shirt..oh, and breakfast is included but do not expect anything fancy. Would not recommend.
